mapper.update: update paper set paper_code = #{paperCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paper_name = #{paperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paper_type = #{paperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, read_type = #{readType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, topic_total_num = #{topicTotalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topic_total_point = #{topicTotalPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select paper_id, paper_code, paper_name, paper_type, read_type, status, topic_total_num, topic_total_point, del_flag from paper where paper_id = #{paperId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select paper_id, paper_code, paper_name, paper_type, read_type, status, topic_total_num, topic_total_point, del_flag from paper
